# netbox_asns (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "netbox_asns" "asns" {
  filter {
    name  = "asn__gte"
    value = "1000"
  }
  filter {
    name  = "asn__lte"
    value = "2000"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

- `limit` (Number) Defaults to `0`.

- `asns` (List of Object) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--asns))
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
